lanka bankuwa, agramathya karyalaye prathipaththi sanwardhana karyalaya, jathika prathipaththi ha aarthika katayuthu amathyanshaye, madhyama wadasatahan kalamanakarana eekakaya saha tharuna katayuthu, wyapruthi kalamanakarana ha dakshina sanwardhana amathyanshaye kuda wyapara sanwardhana anshaya samanga ekwa kriyathmaka karana “thurunu diriya”naya yojana kramaya rate tharuna wyawasayakayin sawibala ganwima aramuna karagena kriyathmaka karanu labana athara emagin upadhiyak sahitha ho piligath wruththiya nipunatha sahathikayak sahitha, wasara 03 kata noadu kalayak wyaparaye niyali tharuna wyawasayakayin udesa apakaruwan rahithawa ho lihil apa sahithawa, adu poliyak yatathe naya pahasukam labadeyi.
raswime nyaya pathraya thula pragathi wartha ha antharkriyakari wishayayan yana deanshayehi mishranayak pawathiya yuthuya.
